title: card.usage.get Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema

seconds.description: Number of seconds in the analyzed period.

time.description: Start time (Unix epoch seconds) of the analyzed period or, if `mode="total"`, the time of activation.

bytes_sent.description: Number of bytes sent by the Notecard to Notehub.

bytes_received.description: Number of bytes received by the Notecard from Notehub.

notes_sent.description: Approximate number of Notes sent by the Notecard to Notehub.

notes_received.description: Approximate number of Notes received by the Notecard from Notehub.
